title: Connecticut AG Jepsen on Immigration, Banks and EPA (Audio)
itunes:title: Connecticut AG Jepsen on Immigration, Banks and EPA (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Law co-hosts June Grasso, Michael Best and Greg Stohr, speak with Connecticut attorney general George Jepson about his opposition of Donald Trump's immigration order, as well as his work for consumer advocacy surrounding banks and the environment. He speaks with Michael Best and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
